overview: The stooges are movers for an express company and on a rainy night are sent to move some junk, including a suit of armor, from a spooky old house. The armor is haunted by the ghost of Peeping Tom, who has no intention of leaving. The ghost foils the stooges attempts to take the armor, until Lady Godiva shows up and the two ride off together.
tagline: The Stooges are movers from A to Z Express Co. assigned in Smorgasbord Castle where they learn the legend of Peeping Tom, accused of peeping at Lady Godiva.
title: The Ghost Talks
